transArray.content: Very good, I like it very much. I can recommend it to my friends. It is very close to the China-Japan Friendship Hospital.

Dear guest, thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to leave a review for our store. Hanting University of International Business and Economics Hotel is located in Building 1, No. 2, Shaoyaoju A, North Fourth Ring Road, Beijing. It is only 800 meters away from Shaoyaoju Station of Beijing Subway Line 10 and Line 13. It is close to the China-Japan Friendship Hospital and has very convenient transportation. convenient. There are self-service laundry services and robot delivery services. This is your first choice location for business trips, tourism, and work outings. Welcome to visit again
